DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to explore the impact of a physician-nurse team supervising patient's flow on ED length of stay
DOC.brief_title: Physician-nurse Team to Reduce Emergency Department (ED) Overcrowding
DOC.detailed_description: A physician-nurse team will be in charge of patients flow in the ED during intervention periods. During control periods, no team will be present. The impact of this team on Ed length of stay will be assessed.
DOC.criteria: all adult patients > 16 years presenting to the ED
